ðŸ“– Summary: simplejson is a Python library for encoding and decoding JSON data. It provides a simple, fast, and extensible solution for serializing Python objects into JSON strings and deserializing JSON strings into Python objects. It supports a wide range of Python versions and offers customization options for handling different data types and encodings.
